title: Leveraging data and AI to deliver on the promise of digital health
technology_discussed: Artificial Intelligence; Big Data; Cloud computing
research_description: The paper explores the role of data and AI in transforming global health systems, especially in low- and middle-income countries (LMICs). The Broadband Commission's working group on digital and AI in health identifies key challenges and proposes a framework for countries to support digital health solutions.
research_results: The study highlights the fragmented landscape of digital health solutions and the lack of coordination and capacity in many LMICs. It proposes six building blocks for digital health systems, including a national digital health strategy, regulatory frameworks, infrastructure, interoperability, partnerships, and sustained financing.
future_research: Future research should focus on developing AI-enabled health systems that are sustainable, interoperable, and responsive to the unique challenges of LMICs.
